00045 AccessGroup::AccessGroup(const TableIdentifier *identifier,
00046     SchemaPtr &schema, Schema::AccessGroup *ag, const RangeSpec *range)
00047   : m_outstanding_scanner_count(0), m_identifier(*identifier), m_schema(schema), m_name(ag->name),
00048     m_next_cs_id(0), m_disk_usage(0), m_compression_ratio(1.0),
00049     m_is_root(false), m_compaction_revision(0),
00050     m_earliest_cached_revision(TIMESTAMP_NULL),
00051     m_earliest_cached_revision_saved(TIMESTAMP_NULL), m_collisions(0),
00052     m_needs_compaction(false), m_drop(false),
00053     m_file_tracker(identifier, schema, range, ag->name),
00054     m_recovering(false) {
00055 
00056   m_table_name = m_identifier.name;
00057   m_start_row = range->start_row;
00058   m_end_row = range->end_row;
00059   m_range_name = m_table_name + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00060   m_full_name = m_range_name + "(" + m_name + ")";
00061   m_cell_cache = new CellCache();
00062 
00063   foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *cf, ag->columns)
00064     m_column_families.insert(cf->id);
00065 
00066   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0
00067                && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00068   m_in_memory = ag->in_memory;
00069 
00070   m_cellstore_props = new Properties();
00071   m_cellstore_props->set("compressor", ag->compressor.size() ?
00072       ag->compressor : schema->get_compressor());
00073   m_cellstore_props->set("blocksize", ag->blocksize);
00074 
00075   if (ag->bloom_filter.size())
00076     Schema::parse_bloom_filter(ag->bloom_filter, m_cellstore_props);
00077   else {
00078     assert(Config::properties); // requires Config::init* first
00079     Schema::parse_bloom_filter(Config::get_str("Hypertable.RangeServer"
00080         ".CellStore.DefaultBloomFilter"), m_cellstore_props);
00081   }
00082   m_bloom_filter_disabled = BLOOM_FILTER_DISABLED ==
00083       m_cellstore_props->get<BloomFilterMode>("bloom-filter-mode");
00084 }

00087 AccessGroup::~AccessGroup() {
00088   if (m_drop) {
00089     if (m_identifier.id == 0) {
00090       HT_ERROR("~AccessGroup has drop bit set, but table is METADATA");
00091       return;
00092     }
00093     String metadata_key = format("%u:%s", m_identifier.id, m_end_row.c_str());
00094     TableMutatorPtr mutator;
00095     KeySpec key;
00096 
00097     try {
00098       mutator = Global::metadata_table->create_mutator();
00099 
00100       key.row = metadata_key.c_str();
00101       key.row_len = metadata_key.length();
00102       key.column_family = "Files";
00103       key.column_qualifier = m_name.c_str();
00104       key.column_qualifier_len = m_name.length();
00105       mutator->set(key, (uint8_t *)"!", 1);
00106       mutator->flush();
00107     }
00108     catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00109       HT_ERRORF("Problem updating 'File' column of METADATA (%s) - %s",
00110                 metadata_key.c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00111     }
00112   }
00113 }
00114 
00122 void AccessGroup::update_schema(SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00123                                 Schema::AccessGroup *ag) {
00124   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00125   std::set<uint8_t>::iterator iter;
00126 
00127   if (schema_ptr->get_generation() > m_schema->get_generation()) {
00128     foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *cf, ag->columns) {
00129       if((iter = m_column_families.find(cf->id)) == m_column_families.end()) {
00130         // Add new column families
00131         if(cf->deleted == false ) {
00132           m_column_families.insert(cf->id);
00133         }
00134       }
00135       else {
00136         // Delete existing cfs
00137         if (cf->deleted == true) {
00138           m_column_families.erase(iter);
00139         }
00140         // TODO: In future other types of updates
00141         // such as alter table modify etc will go in here
00142       }
00143     }
00144     // Update schema ptr
00145     m_schema = schema_ptr;
00146   }
00147 }
00148 
00154 void AccessGroup::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00155   if (key.revision > m_compaction_revision || !m_recovering) {
00156     if (m_earliest_cached_revision == TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00157       m_earliest_cached_revision = key.revision;
00158     return m_cell_cache->add(key, value);
00159   }
00160 }

00162 
00163 CellListScanner *AccessGroup::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_context) {
00164   MergeScanner *scanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context);
00165   CellStoreReleaseCallback callback(this);
00166 
00167   {
00168     ScopedLock lock(m_outstanding_scanner_mutex);
00169     m_outstanding_scanner_count++;
00170   }
00171 
00172   try {
00173     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00174 
00175     scanner->add_scanner(m_cell_cache->create_scanner(scan_context));
00176 
00177     if (m_immutable_cache)
00178       scanner->add_scanner(m_immutable_cache->create_scanner(scan_context));
00179 
00180     if (!m_in_memory) {
00181 
00182       for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); ++i) {
00183 
00184         // Query bloomfilter only if it is enabled and a start row has been specified
00185         // (ie query is not something like select bar from foo;)
00186 
00187         if (m_bloom_filter_disabled ||
00188             !scan_context->single_row || 
00189             scan_context->start_row == "") {
00190           scanner->add_scanner(m_stores[i]->create_scanner(scan_context));
00191           callback.add_file(m_stores[i]->get_filename());
00192         }
00193         else if (m_stores[i]->may_contain(scan_context)) {
00194           scanner->add_scanner(m_stores[i]->create_scanner(scan_context));
00195           callback.add_file(m_stores[i]->get_filename());
00196         }
00197       }
00198     }
00199   }
00200   catch (Exception &e) {
00201     ScopedLock lock(m_outstanding_scanner_mutex);
00202     m_outstanding_scanner_count--;
00203     delete scanner;
00204     HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Problem creating scanner on access group %s",
00205                m_full_name.c_str());
00206   }
00207 
00208   m_file_tracker.add_references(callback.get_file_vector());
00209   scanner->install_release_callback(callback);
00210 
00211   return scanner;
00212 }
00213 
00214 bool AccessGroup::include_in_scan(ScanContextPtr &scan_context) {
00215   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00216   for (std::set<uint8_t>::iterator iter = m_column_families.begin();
00217        iter != m_column_families.end(); ++iter) {
00218     if (scan_context->family_mask[*iter])
00219       return true;
00220   }
00221   return false;
00222 }

00224 const char *AccessGroup::get_split_row() {
00225   std::vector<String> split_rows;
00226   get_split_rows(split_rows, true);
00227   if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00228     sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00229     return (split_rows[split_rows.size()/2]).c_str();
00230   }
00231   return "";
00232 }
00233 
00234 void
00235 AccessGroup::get_split_rows(std::vector<String> &split_rows,
00236                             bool include_cache) {
00237   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00238   const char *row;
00239   for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00240     row = m_stores[i]->get_split_row();
00241     if (row)
00242       split_rows.push_back(row);
00243   }
00244   if (include_cache) {
00245     if (m_immutable_cache &&
00246         m_immutable_cache->size() > m_cell_cache->size())
00247       m_immutable_cache->get_split_rows(split_rows);
00248     else
00249       m_cell_cache->get_split_rows(split_rows);
00250   }
00251 }
00252 
00253 void AccessGroup::get_cached_rows(std::vector<String> &rows) {
00254   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00255   if (m_immutable_cache &&
00256       m_immutable_cache->size() > m_cell_cache->size())
00257     m_immutable_cache->get_rows(rows);
00258   else
00259     m_cell_cache->get_rows(rows);
00260 }

00262 
00263 uint64_t AccessGroup::disk_usage() {
00264   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00265   uint64_t du = (m_in_memory) ? 0 : m_disk_usage;
00266   uint64_t mu = m_cell_cache->memory_used();
00267   if (m_immutable_cache)
00268     mu += m_immutable_cache->memory_used();
00269   return du + (uint64_t)(m_compression_ratio * (float)mu);
00270 }
00271 
00272 uint64_t AccessGroup::memory_usage() {
00273   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00274   uint64_t mu = m_cell_cache->memory_used();
00275   if (m_immutable_cache)
00276     mu += m_immutable_cache->memory_used();
00277   return mu;
00278 }
00279 
00280 void AccessGroup::space_usage(int64_t *memp, int64_t *diskp) {
00281   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00282   *memp = m_cell_cache->memory_used();
00283   if (m_immutable_cache)
00284     *memp += m_immutable_cache->memory_used();
00285   *diskp = (m_in_memory) ? 0 : m_disk_usage;
00286   *diskp += (int64_t)(m_compression_ratio * (float)*memp);
00287 }

00290 void AccessGroup::purge_index_data(uint64_t access_counter) {
00291   ScopedLock lock(m_outstanding_scanner_mutex);
00292 
00293   if (m_outstanding_scanner_count > 0)
00294     return;
00295 
00296   {
00297     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00298     for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00299       m_stores[i]->maybe_purge_indexes(access_counter);
00300   }
00301 
00302 }

00304 AccessGroup::MaintenanceData *AccessGroup::get_maintenance_data(ByteArena &arena) {
00305   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00306   MaintenanceData *mdata = (MaintenanceData *)arena.alloc(sizeof(MaintenanceData));
00307 
00308   mdata->ag = this;
00309 
00310   if (m_earliest_cached_revision_saved != TIMESTAMP_NULL)
00311     mdata->earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00312   else
00313     mdata->earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision;
00314 
00315   int64_t mu = m_cell_cache->memory_used();
00316   if (m_immutable_cache)
00317     mu += m_immutable_cache->memory_used();
00318   mdata->mem_used = mu;
00319 
00320   int64_t du = m_in_memory ? 0 : m_disk_usage;
00321   mdata->disk_used = du + (int64_t)(m_compression_ratio * (float)mu);
00322 
00323   mdata->outstanding_scanners = m_outstanding_scanner_count;
00324   mdata->in_memory = m_in_memory;
00325   mdata->deletes = m_cell_cache->get_delete_count();
00326 
00327   // add TTL stuff
00328 
00329   return mdata;
00330 }

00332 
00333 void AccessGroup::add_cell_store(CellStorePtr &cellstore, uint32_t id) {
00334   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00335 
00336   // Figure out the "next" CellStore number
00337   if (id >= m_next_cs_id)
00338     m_next_cs_id = id+1;
00339   else if (m_in_memory)
00340     return;
00341 
00342   m_disk_usage += cellstore->disk_usage();
00343   m_compression_ratio = cellstore->compression_ratio();
00344 
00345   // Record the most recent compaction revision
00346   if (m_compaction_revision == 0)
00347     m_compaction_revision = cellstore->get_revision();
00348   else {
00349     int64_t revision = cellstore->get_revision();
00350     if (revision > m_compaction_revision)
00351       m_compaction_revision = revision;
00352   }
00353 
00354   if (m_in_memory) {
00355     HT_ASSERT(m_stores.empty());
00356     ScanContextPtr scan_context = new ScanContext(m_schema);
00357     CellListScannerPtr scanner = cellstore->create_scanner(scan_context);
00358     ByteString key, value;
00359     Key key_comps;
00360     m_cell_cache = new CellCache();
00361     while (scanner->get(key_comps, value)) {
00362       m_cell_cache->add(key_comps, value);
00363       scanner->forward();
00364     }
00365   }
00366 
00367   m_stores.push_back(cellstore);
00368 
00369   m_file_tracker.add_live(cellstore->get_filename());
00370 }
00371 
00372 namespace {
00373   struct LtCellStore {
00374     bool operator()(const CellStorePtr &x, const CellStorePtr &y) const {
00375       return x->disk_usage() > y->disk_usage();
00376     }
00377   };
00378 }

00380 
00381 void AccessGroup::run_compaction(bool major) {
00382   ByteString bskey;
00383   ByteString value;
00384   Key key;
00385   CellListScannerPtr scanner;
00386   size_t tableidx = 1;
00387   CellStorePtr cellstore;
00388   CellCachePtr filtered_cache;
00389   String metadata_key_str;
00390 
00391   try {
00392 
00393     if (!major && !m_needs_compaction)
00394       HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00395 
00396     HT_ASSERT(m_immutable_cache);
00397 
00398     {
00399       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00400       if (m_in_memory) {
00401         if (m_immutable_cache->memory_used() == 0)
00402           HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00403         tableidx = m_stores.size();
00404         HT_INFOF("Starting InMemory Compaction of %s(%s)",
00405                  m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00406       }
00407       else if (major) {
00408         if (m_immutable_cache->memory_used()==0 && m_stores.size() <= (size_t)1)
00409           HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00410         tableidx = 0;
00411         HT_INFOF("Starting Major Compaction of %s(%s)",
00412                  m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00413       }
00414       else {
00415         if (m_stores.size() > (size_t)Global::access_group_max_files) {
00416           LtCellStore descending;
00417           sort(m_stores.begin(), m_stores.end(), descending);
00418           tableidx = m_stores.size() - Global::access_group_merge_files;
00419           HT_INFOF("Starting Merging Compaction of %s(%s)",
00420                    m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00421         }
00422         else {
00423           if (m_immutable_cache->memory_used() == 0)
00424             HT_THROW(Error::OK, "");
00425           tableidx = m_stores.size();
00426           HT_INFOF("Starting Minor Compaction of %s(%s)",
00427                    m_range_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str());
00428         }
00429       }
00430     }
00431 
00432   }
00433   catch (Exception &e) {
00434     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00435     merge_caches();
00436     if (m_earliest_cached_revision_saved != TIMESTAMP_NULL) {
00437       m_earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00438       m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00439     }
00440     return;
00441   }
00442 
00443   try {
00444 
00445     // TODO: Issue 11
00446     char hash_str[33];
00447 
00448     if (m_end_row == "")
00449       memset(hash_str, '0', 24);
00450     else
00451       md5_string(m_end_row.c_str(), hash_str);
00452 
00453     hash_str[24] = 0;
00454     String cs_file = format("/hypertable/tables/%s/%s/%s/cs%d",
00455                             m_table_name.c_str(), m_name.c_str(), hash_str,
00456                             m_next_cs_id++);
00457 
00458     cellstore = new CellStoreV1(Global::dfs);
00459     int64_t max_num_entries = 0;
00460 
00461 
00462     {
00463       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00464       ScanContextPtr scan_context = new ScanContext(m_schema);
00465 
00466       max_num_entries = m_immutable_cache->size();
00467 
00468       if (m_in_memory) {
00469         MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context, false);
00470         scanner = mscanner;
00471         mscanner->add_scanner(m_immutable_cache->create_scanner(scan_context));
00472         filtered_cache = new CellCache();
00473       }
00474       else if (major || tableidx < m_stores.size()) {
00475         bool return_everything = (major) ? false : (tableidx > 0);
00476         MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_context,
00477                                                   return_everything);
00478         scanner = mscanner;
00479         mscanner->add_scanner(m_immutable_cache->create_scanner(scan_context));
00480         for (size_t i=tableidx; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00481           mscanner->add_scanner(m_stores[i]->create_scanner(scan_context));
00482           max_num_entries += boost::any_cast<int64_t>
00483               (m_stores[i]->get_trailer()->get("total_entries"));
00484         }
00485       }
00486       else {
00487         scanner = m_immutable_cache->create_scanner(scan_context);
00488       }
00489     }
00490 
00491     cellstore->create(cs_file.c_str(), max_num_entries, m_cellstore_props);
00492 
00493     while (scanner->get(key, value)) {
00494       cellstore->add(key, value);
00495       if (m_in_memory)
00496         filtered_cache->add(key, value);
00497       scanner->forward();
00498     }
00499 
00500     cellstore->finalize(&m_identifier);
00501 
00505     {
00506       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00507 
00508       m_file_tracker.clear_live();
00509 
00510       if (m_in_memory) {
00511         m_immutable_cache = filtered_cache;
00512         merge_caches();
00513         m_stores.clear();
00514       }
00515       else {
00516 
00517         for (size_t i=0; i<tableidx; i++)
00518           m_file_tracker.add_live(m_stores[i]->get_filename());
00519 
00520         m_immutable_cache = 0;
00521 
00523         if (tableidx < m_stores.size())
00524           m_stores.resize(tableidx);
00525       }
00526 
00530       if (cellstore->get_total_entries() > 0) {
00531         m_stores.push_back(cellstore);
00532         m_file_tracker.add_live(cellstore->get_filename());
00533       }
00534       else {
00535         String fname = cellstore->get_filename();
00536         cellstore = 0;
00537         try {
00538           Global::dfs->remove(fname);
00539         }
00540         catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00541           HT_ERROR_OUT << "Problem removing '" << fname.c_str() << "' " \
00542                        << e << HT_END;
00543         }
00544       }
00545 
00547       m_disk_usage = 0;
00548       m_compression_ratio = 0.0;
00549       for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00550         double disk_usage = m_stores[i]->disk_usage();
00551         m_disk_usage += (uint64_t)disk_usage;
00552         m_compression_ratio += m_stores[i]->compression_ratio() * disk_usage;
00553       }
00554       m_compression_ratio /= m_disk_usage;
00555 
00556       if (cellstore)
00557         m_compaction_revision = cellstore->get_revision();
00558 
00559     }
00560 
00561     m_file_tracker.update_files_column();
00562 
00563     m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00564 
00565     HT_INFOF("Finished Compaction of %s(%s)", m_range_name.c_str(),
00566              m_name.c_str());
00567 
00568   }
00569   catch (Exception &e) {
00570     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00571     HT_ERROR_OUT << m_range_name << "(" << m_name << ") " << e << HT_END;
00572     merge_caches();
00573     if (m_earliest_cached_revision_saved != TIMESTAMP_NULL) {
00574       m_earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00575       m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00576     }
00577     throw;
00578   }
00579 
00580   m_needs_compaction = false;
00581 }

00584 
00588 void AccessGroup::shrink(String &split_row, bool drop_high) {
00589   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00590   CellCachePtr old_cell_cache = m_cell_cache;
00591   CellCachePtr new_cell_cache;
00592   ScanContextPtr scan_context = new ScanContext(m_schema);
00593   CellListScannerPtr cell_cache_scanner;
00594   ByteString key;
00595   ByteString value;
00596   Key key_comps;
00597   std::vector<CellStorePtr> new_stores;
00598   CellStore *new_cell_store;
00599   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
00600   uint64_t items_added = 0;
00601   int cmp;
00602 
00603   m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = m_earliest_cached_revision;
00604   m_earliest_cached_revision = TIMESTAMP_MAX;
00605 
00606   try {
00607 
00608     if (drop_high) {
00609       m_end_row = split_row;
00610       m_next_cs_id = 0;
00611     }
00612     else
00613       m_start_row = split_row;
00614 
00615     m_range_name = m_table_name + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00616 
00617     m_file_tracker.change_range(m_start_row, m_end_row);
00618 
00619     new_cell_cache = new CellCache();
00620     new_cell_cache->lock();
00621 
00622     m_cell_cache = new_cell_cache;
00623 
00624     cell_cache_scanner = old_cell_cache->create_scanner(scan_context);
00625 
00629     while (cell_cache_scanner->get(key_comps, value)) {
00630 
00631       cmp = strcmp(key_comps.row, split_row.c_str());
00632 
00633       if ((cmp > 0 && !drop_high) || (cmp <= 0 && drop_high)) {
00634         if (key_comps.revision < m_earliest_cached_revision)
00635           m_earliest_cached_revision = key_comps.revision;
00636         add(key_comps, value);
00637         memory_added += key.length() + value.length();
00638         items_added++;
00639       }
00640       cell_cache_scanner->forward();
00641     }
00642 
00643     new_cell_cache->unlock();
00644 
00648     m_disk_usage = 0;
00649     for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++) {
00650       String filename = m_stores[i]->get_filename();
00651       new_cell_store = CellStoreFactory::open(filename, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00652       m_disk_usage += new_cell_store->disk_usage();
00653       new_stores.push_back(new_cell_store);
00654     }
00655 
00656     m_stores = new_stores;
00657 
00658     m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00659 
00660   }
00661   catch (Exception &e) {
00662     m_cell_cache = old_cell_cache;
00663     m_earliest_cached_revision = m_earliest_cached_revision_saved;
00664     m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00665     HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, "shrink failed");
00666   }
00667 }
00668 
00669 
00670 
00673 void AccessGroup::release_files(const std::vector<String> &files) {
00674   {
00675     ScopedLock lock(m_outstanding_scanner_mutex);
00676     HT_ASSERT(m_outstanding_scanner_count > 0);
00677     m_outstanding_scanner_count--;
00678   }
00679   m_file_tracker.remove_references(files);
00680   m_file_tracker.update_files_column();
00681 }
00682 
00683 
00684 void AccessGroup::initiate_compaction() {
00685   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00686   HT_ASSERT(!m_immutable_cache);
00687   m_immutable_cache = m_cell_cache;
00688   m_immutable_cache->freeze();
00689   m_cell_cache = new CellCache();
00690   m_earliest_cached_revision_saved = m_earliest_cached_revision;
00691   m_earliest_cached_revision = TIMESTAMP_NULL;
00692 }
00693 
00694 
00695 
00699 void AccessGroup::merge_caches() {
00700 
00701   if (!m_immutable_cache)
00702     return;
00703 
00704   if (m_immutable_cache->size() == 0) {
00705     m_immutable_cache = 0;
00706     return;
00707   }
00708   else if (m_cell_cache->size() == 0) {
00709     m_cell_cache = m_immutable_cache;
00710     m_cell_cache->unfreeze();
00711     m_immutable_cache = 0;
00712     return;
00713   }
00714 
00715   Key key;
00716   ByteString value;
00717   CellCachePtr merged_cache = new CellCache();
00718   ScanContextPtr scan_context = new ScanContext(m_schema);
00719   CellListScannerPtr scanner = m_immutable_cache->create_scanner(scan_context);
00720   while (scanner->get(key, value)) {
00721     merged_cache->add(key, value);
00722     scanner->forward();
00723   }
00724 
00725   // Add cell cache
00726   scanner = m_cell_cache->create_scanner(scan_context);
00727   while (scanner->get(key, value)) {
00728     merged_cache->add(key, value);
00729     scanner->forward();
00730   }
00731   m_immutable_cache = 0;
00732   m_cell_cache = merged_cache;
00733 }
